about_the_game:
Parallel World is a game that can bring you happiness and a sense of accomplishment just by moving the mouse.

The gameplay of the game is the same as the spot-difference game we usually play. You just need to find the different places in the two different scenes on the left and right, and then mark them. Each level will set up several different items, and some special scenes will also arrange some special hidden items.

The content of the game is very simple. Almost everyone has played the spot-difference game. The difference is that the usual games are usually just 2 pictures. The static content will become a little monotonous after playing for a long time. This is a dynamic game scene, and each scene is designed very beautifully. You can rotate or move the scene to observe every foot of the scene to make sure you find those differences or hidden objects.

We think that even if you just appreciate the cute scenes in the game and listen to the music, you can also gain a lot of happiness.

name: Parallel World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN 10
  • Processor: i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN 10
  • Processor: i7-10700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: There are always similar but not exactly the same things in the parallel world. You only need to be a little more careful to find them. When playing the game, you can immerse yourself in the beautiful music, and you can harvest your own happiness in various scenes with a click of the mouse.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
